thread.title: City officials to represent Charlotte in China
thread.title_full: City officials to represent Charlotte in China - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: City officials to represent Charlotte in China
text: Council member Patsy Kinsey and Economic Development Director Bill Cronin plan to represent the city as part of a delegation to China Oct. 25 to Nov. 11. The Carolinas Chinese Chamber of Commerce, N.C. Department of Commerce and The Chinese Peopleâ€™s Association for Friendship with Foreign Countries planned the trip to leading commercial and industrial cities. " This is a great opportunity for us to tell our story and establish key business relationships, " Kinsey said in a statement. Staff reports
